Project, file name, and file content to create. The /files/create API accepts requests in the following format:

CreateProjectFileRequest Model - Request to add a file to a project.
projectId integer
required
Id of the project to add the file.
name string
required
The name of the new file.
content string
The content of the new file.
codeSourceId string
Name of the environment that's creating the request.
Example 
{
  "projectId": 0,
  "name": "string",
  "content": "string",
  "codeSourceId": "string"
}
